name: pnp-devproxy-jsonplaceholder-mocks
title: JSONPlaceholder API mocks
shortDescription: Demonstrates how Dev Proxy can mock API responses using the popular JSONPlaceholder API as an example. Perfect for learning how Dev Proxy intercepts and replaces API calls with mock responses.
longDescription: Demonstrates how Dev Proxy can mock API responses using the popular JSONPlaceholder API as an example. Perfect for learning how Dev Proxy intercepts and replaces API calls with mock responses.

thumbnails.alt: Dev Proxy simulating mocking JSONPlaceholder API request

references.name: Get started with the Dev Proxy
references.description: The tutorial will introduce you to the Dev Proxy and show you how to use its features.

references.name: Change mocks file
references.description: Instructions on how to change the mocks file used by the Dev Proxy.

references.name: MockResponsePlugin documentation
references.description: The documentation of the MockResponsePlugin for the Dev Proxy.

references.name: JSONPlaceholder API documentation
references.description: Official documentation for the JSONPlaceholder fake REST API.
